verbose_text: It has been reported that CD30 expression is a favorable prognostic factor in a cohort of 903 patients with de novo DLBCL.22 Patients with CD30 + DLBCL had a superior 5-year OS (CD30 +, 79% vs CD30 -, 50%; P =.001 and PFS (P =.003).22 The favorable outcome of CD30 + expression was maintained in both the germinal center and activated B-cell subtypes.22 4 CONCLUSION.
